title: The Beauville-Voisin conjecture for double EPW sextics
abstract: We prove that the Beauville-Voisin conjecture is true for any double EPW sextic, i.e. the subalgebra of the Chow ring generated by divisors and Chern classes of the tangent bundle injects into cohomology.
comment: 18 pages, to appear in Kyoto J. of Math., comments very welcome !
